title: Forget Big Tech - I'll Take Dividend Stalwarts Any Day

title: The Coca-Cola Company Announces New Reporting Lines for Costa Coffee and innocent Businesses to Europe Operating Unit
text: ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The Coca-Cola Company announced today that innocent Drinks and Costa Coffee will report to the company's Europe operating unit, effective Jan. 1, 2025. These organizational changes are intended to streamline and simplify the current structure. There are no significant numbers of employment changes, as the vast majority of current roles will continue.
